description: The [Refuge Project](http://refuge.io/) aims to provide a fully decentralized and opensource data platform. It is built in Erlang and includes [RCouch](https://github.com/refuge/rcouch), a static distribution of couchdb using rebar, and [Coffer](https://github.com/refuge/coffer), a blob server.
ohloh_description: space invaders with a dash of puzzle bobble, for ludum dare #15.
name: Refuge
